com.codename1.geoviz

Class Feature

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.codename1.geoviz.Feature

  • public class Feature
extends java.lang.Object
    Encapsulates a "Feature" from a GEOJSON dataset. http://geojson.org/geojson-spec.html#feature-objects

      • setGeometry

        public void setGeometry(com.codename1.ui.geom.GeneralPath path)
        Sets the geometry of the feature. Shape coordinates should be expressed in (lng,lat) pairs.
        Parameters:
        path - The path to represent the geometry of this feature.
